開瞼器: (かいけんき) - eyelid speculum; lid retractor
開示: (かいじ) - release (e.g. information); disclosure (legal); show; indication; display

開票率: (かいひょうりつ) - percentage of votes counted so far
開票結果: (かいひょうけっか) - results of the vote count
開票速報: (かいひょうそくほう) - quick (flash) report of votes counted

開経偈: (かいきょうげ) - opening chant of a sutra
開缶器: (かいかんき) - punch-style can opener (punches a round or V-shaped hole in a can of liquid)
開脚: (かいきゃく) - with the legs spread

開腹手術: (かいふくしゅじゅつ) - laparotomy (abdominal surgery)
開花: (かいか) - flowers budding/blooming/flowering; showing results/becoming popular/blooming
開講: (かいこう) - holding a course (of lectures)/offering a course; beginning a series of one's lectures/starting a new course
開通: (かいつう) - opening; open; taking effect; becoming active
開通式: (かいつうしき) - formal opening (e.g. of a rail-road)
開運商法: (かいうんしょうほう) - fraudulent way of business, cajoling people into buying articles for an extremely high price by claiming they will bring good luck
開闢: (かいびゃく) - beginnings; creation; founding (of empire)
開闢以来: (かいびゃくいらい) - (yoji) since the creation (of the world); since the dawn of history
開院: (かいいん) - opening congress; hospital opening
開音: (かいおん) - long "o" vowel arising from combination of the "a" and "u" sounds
開館: (かいかん) - opening a hall for that day's business (museum, library, etc.); opening of new hall (museum, etc.)
閑: (kan) - lazer, tempo livre, tempo de lazer, lazer
閑人: (かんじん) - person with a lot of free time on their hands; person of leisure; idler
閑古鳥が鳴く: (かんこどりがなく) - to be in a slump (of a business); (business is) slow
閑地: (かんち) - quiet place; vacant land; fallow ground; undemanding job; sinecure; life of leisurely retirement
閑寂枯淡: (かんじゃくこたん) - (yoji)  aesthetic sense in Japanese art emphasising quiet simplicity and subdued refinement
閑居: (かんきょ) - quiet and secluded life; quiet retreat; idle life
閑散: (kansan) - deserted (especialmente loja, mercado, cidade, ruas), quiet, still, hushed, empty; inactive (business, trade, etc.), slack, flat, off-season, quiet, dull , deserted (esp. store, market, town, streets), quiet, still, hushed, empty; inactive (business, trade, etc.), slack, flat, off-season, quiet, dull; idle, free, unoccupied
閑文字: (かんもんじ) - idle words (in a written passage); useless words; empty words
閑職: (かんしょく) - leisurely post; do-nothing job; sinecure
閑話休題: (kanwakyuudai) - Now let's return to the main subject, To return from the digression,.. (em uma conversa, discurso ou narrativa)
閑談: (かんだん) - quiet conversation; idle talk
閑雲野鶴: (かんうんやかく) - (yoji) life in natural setting, free from worldly cares
間: (kan/ken/aida/ma) - interval , space (between), gap, interval, distance; time (between), pause, break; span (temporal or spatial), stretch, period (while); relationship (between, among)
間々: (まま) - occasionally; now and then; sometimes
間がない: (まがない) - (preceded by v-te) not long has passed since ...
間が抜ける: (まがぬける) - to look stupid; to have a critical lack
間が持てない: (まがもてない) - not knowing what to do with the time one has on one's hand
間が無い: (まがない) - (preceded by v-te) not long has passed since ...

間じきり: (まじきり) - partition between two rooms; room divider; partition wall
